update tbl_ont_contracts
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
txcount = #{txcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
abi = #{abi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ontcount = #{ontcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ongcount = #{ongcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_ont_contracts set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, txcount = #{txcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, abi = #{abi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addresscount = #{addresscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ontcount = #{ontcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ongcount = #{ongcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tokencount = #{tokencount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dappstoreflag = #{dappstoreflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalreward = #{totalreward,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_ont_contracts where auditflag = 1
select * from tbl_ont_contracts order by createtime DESC
select * from tbl_ont_contracts where auditflag = 1 order by createtime DESC
select * from tbl_ont_contracts where project = #{project} order by createtime DESC

select contract as ContractHash, Name, TxCount, ABI, Code, CreateTime, ContactInfo, UpdateTime, Logo, Description, Creator, AddressCount, OntCount, OngCount,tokencount,Type from tbl_ont_contracts where auditflag = 1 order by createtime DESC limit #{Start}, #{PageSize}
select contract as ContractHash, Name, Logo, Description, Category, CreateTime, Project, TotalReward from tbl_ont_contracts where dappstoreflag = 1
